items.sentence: The truth is that Tom and I don't really talk much.
Will your friends be seeing you off at the airport?
Birch trees grow well in acidic, well-drained soil.
I had planned to become a teacher, but I never did.
I used to know where Tom lived, but I've forgotten.
The police officer said that we should go that way.
It\'s easier to teach children than to teach adults.
It\'s hard to believe that Tom could murder someone.
It\'s not what you say, but what you do that counts.
Let go of my arm! I can\'t stand people touching me.
